scripts.build: cd oauth-test && cd client && npm run build
scripts.start: cd oauth-test && cd server && node server.js
scripts.server:dev: cd oauth-test && cd server && npm run dev
scripts.client:dev: cd oauth-test && cd client && npm run dev
scripts.install:client: cd oauth-test && cd client && npm install
scripts.install:server: cd oauth-test && cd server && npm install
scripts.install:all: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
